nodes.text: Bryar rifle was a rifle which could be modified to make a Bryar pistol. The Bryar rifle had the same ability as the pistol: it could fire a 'charge,' one large shot as opposed to the weaker and smaller, although faster, shots. Bryar rifles were popular during the waning days of the Galactic Republic. The Bryar rifle was heavy, and less accurate than other types of blaster rifles.

Morgan Katarn gave a Bryar rifle to his son, Kyle Katarn, as a parting gift on the eve of his induction to the Imperial Academy, but Morgan sawed it down into a Bryar pistol so that it wouldn't appear quite as old-fashioned.
